items.content_html: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.
items.title: thegreedymaster1234/JavaScript-Email-Protection-JEP: JavaScript Email Protection (JEP) is a simple and lightweight way to keep your email safe from spam bots. Instead of leaving your email exposed in plain HTML (where bots can easily grab it), this script dynamically inserts it using JavaScript—making it way harder for scrapers to detect.

items.content_html: Silana Lite Official is a smart WhatsApp *** powered by AI, offering a wide range of features like automated responses, multimedia downloads, language translation, text-to-speech, and more. items.content_html: a web scraper in Node.js using Puppeteer (for headless browser automation) or Cheerio (for lightweight HTML parsing). Since Google blocks automated scraping, we recommend using an official API like the Google Search API.

items.content_html: a lightweight, Dockerized tool for quick, bulk image optimization—resizing and converting formats (including iPhone HEIC) into high-quality JPEG or PNG. Use it through a modern Web UI for an easy, fast workflow or leverage its CLI for seamless CI/CD integration.
